GET./coords/:zip: Returns latitude and longitude coordinates from the zip code(:zip) provided.
GET./city/:lat/:lon: Returns the city that is at the latitude(:lat) and longitude(:lon) provided.

GET./current/:lat/:lon: Returns a json object with the current weather for the lattitude(:lat) and longitude(:lon) provided.
GET./three-day/:lat/:lon: Returns a json object with the three-day forecast for the lattitude(:lat) and longitude(:lon) provided
